subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby and Evgeni Malkin extended point streaks and Georges Laraque scored for the first time in 40 games to help the Pittsburgh Penguins defeat the Islanders, 3-2, to end a four-game losing streak.
snippet: Sidney Crosby and Evgeni Malkin extended point streaks and Georges Laraque scored for the first time in 40 games to help the Pittsburgh Penguins defeat the Islanders, 3-2, to end a four-game losing streak.
